data.text: @popo4crazytown What a life I love Nicole and Keith

@bethoperanta no, his management team does & make sure that there is always extra security (with her pic) at his public events.  Just as a matter of Keith being Keith he makes sure that Nicole has extra security at his events.  She is an international A list superstar with her own stalkers.
@popo4crazytown K and N knows about her?

@bethoperanta ...3/3 Mail, Just Jared, Twitter & she also has her own blog about him (& her.) She never posts any pictures except for pics & videos others have posted from concerts or media. She spreads her lies about this secret affair  to damage his reputation. I would not call that a fan.

@bethoperanta ...2/3 was playing; when she moved to Nashville, Keith was engaged to Nicole & living with him. Which completely frosted her cookies & she has had a vendetta against Nic since. She has written about her faux secret affair (lie) all over message boards such as E!, CMT, Daily ...

@bethoperanta 1/3 If you read all 5 of the tweets in the thread (and note the # of people that agree) this person has been around forever.  She met KU at a meet & greet in 2003, moved from FL to Nashville after following him all thru FL & GA as a groupie that hung around his bus wherever he...
@popo4crazytown Who you referring to ? Is she a fan?

5/5 arranged photo opportunities & for the purposes of pr for both of them.  Consequently, you have alledged their time & pics with their girls takes advantage of innocent children & that they do not love those photo op children.  Who is cruel? You're a despicable grasping liar.

4/5 you have TRASHED his reputation for devoted fidelity to his wife by constantly claiming a 10 year clandestine affair with you, you have claimed that not only does he love you and not his wife, but all photos of them together (including candid paparazzi snaps) are merely....

3/5 his life & reputation. By all measures he has succeeded and, according to Keith, he is living his best life because of God's intervention & Nicole's love & support. You have attacked his songwriting skills (claiming he requires multiple wording assist from you, his muse), ...

2/5 You have waged a relentless internet & social media campaign against the career Keith has been building since he was 15. His marriage to Nicole in 2006 brought him face to face with demons that he (with her support) has worked extremely hard to conquer and to rehabilitate...
